title: And the Mountains Echoed - Unabridged Audiobook
description:
And the Mountains Echoed [Unabridged] [Audio Edition]


In the 1950s an Afghan villager's daughter is adopted by a wealthy couple. This act is to affect many lives in many places: Kabul, Paris, San Francisco; the girl's brother, her stepmother with a terrible secret, the girl herself as she grapples her Afghan identity; a Greek surgeon doing foreign-aid work, and more. From the bestselling author of The Kite Runner and A Thousand Splendid Suns. "Captivating and affecting... Create[s] a grand and encompassing tree of life."


Listening Length: 14 hours and 1 minute
Program Type: Audiobook
Version: Unabridged
Language: English


I`ve been waiting for this Unabridged Audiobook for long time, but no one uploaded it here. Finally after a lot of hard work, I found it. So here it is, sharing it with everyone. 

Please Seed! 

Enjoy!
